title: Advertising
description: The information related to advertising activity related to the experience event

xdm:adViewability.title: MRC Viewability
xdm:adViewability.description: The runtime measured viewability specific details such as player volume, library version, window status, viewport/ad measured dimensions, etc.

xdm:completes.description: A digital video ad has played through it's entirety.

xdm:conversions.description: A pre-defined action on a website triggered a conversion event to be fired

xdm:firstQuartiles.description: A digital video ad has played through 25% of it's duration at normal speed.

xdm:impressions.description: Impression(s) of an advertisement to an end user with the potential of being viewed.

xdm:midpoint.description: A digital video ad has played through 50% of it's duration at normal speed.

xdm:starts.description: A digital video ad has started playing.

xdm:thirdQuartiles.description: A digital video ad has played through 75% of it's duration at normal speed.
